source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video clip features a camera moving forward out of a dark cave. It reveals a serene, stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley. The scene is characterized by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees under a muted sky.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This video clip features a camera moving forward out of a dark cave. It reveals a serene, stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley. The scene is characterized by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees under a muted sky.

generated_critique: The caption accurately describes the camera's motion and the scenery it reveals. However, it includes the subjective adjective "serene," which should be removed. The description can also be made more concise by combining the sentences. A more effective version would be: "The camera moves forward out of a dark cave, revealing a stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley flanked by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees."
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: The camera moves forward out of a dark cave, revealing a stylized landscape of a misty river flowing through a valley flanked by sunlit rocky cliffs and evergreen trees.
